about_the_game:
Embark on a chilling journey into "The Hell in I." Set in the eerie confines of a long-abandoned asylum, this first-person horror experience will test your nerves as you unravel the mysteries shrouding the infamous St. Agnes Mental Institution.

You find yourself drawn to the derelict asylum by rumors of unspeakable horrors and whispered tales of those who ventured in but never returned. Armed with only your wits and a flickering flashlight, you step into the decaying halls, unaware of the sinister presence that awaits.

Dare to step into the darkness, and discover the echoes of agony that linger within the walls of St. Agnes Mental Institution. Can you survive the night?

content_descriptors.notes: There is gore in this game showing blood and remains of human body parts.

detailed_description:
Embark on a chilling journey into "The Hell in I." Set in the eerie confines of a long-abandoned asylum, this first-person horror experience will test your nerves as you unravel the mysteries shrouding the infamous St. Agnes Mental Institution.

You find yourself drawn to the derelict asylum by rumors of unspeakable horrors and whispered tales of those who ventured in but never returned. Armed with only your wits and a flickering flashlight, you step into the decaying halls, unaware of the sinister presence that awaits.

Dare to step into the darkness, and discover the echoes of agony that linger within the walls of St. Agnes Mental Institution. Can you survive the night?

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu Server
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 3600 / Intel Core i5 9600K
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 1660 Super 6 GB / RX 5600XT 8GB
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Headphones + SSD Highly Recommended
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu Server
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 7 5700X / Intel Core i5 12600K
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce RTX 3060 12GB / RX 6700XT 12GB
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Headphones + SSD Highly Recommended

name: The Hell in I

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 bit)
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 3600 / Intel Core i5 9600K
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 1660 Super 6 GB / RX 5600XT 8GB
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Headphones + SSD Highly Recommended
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11 (64 bit)
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 7 5700X / Intel Core i5 12600K
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce RTX 3060 12GB / RX 6700XT 12GB
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Headphones + SSD Highly Recommended

short_description: Dare to step into the darkness, and discover the echoes of agony that linger within the walls of St. Agnes Mental Institution. Can you survive the night as you solve puzzles and mysteries of the asylum?
